about us

WebServices ltd. was among the first companies offering e-commerce and professional payment processing services, modern fraud
and chargeback prevention instruments and 24/7 customer support.

It did not take long before WebServices ltd. took up a leading position on the market thanks to its constant development and a desire
to overcome a growing competition with the aid of advanced software and customizable services.

Today, every business collaborating with WebServices ltd. can see a significant growth in their revenue. The company works with
businesses from all over the world aiming to meet and even exceed expectations of the customers, both existing and new ones.
